subject: Company Reports
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks remained the N.B.A.’s most valuable franchise for the third straight year, according to Forbes magazine. They were valued at $608 million, up 3 percent from 2006.
snippet: The Knicks remained the N.B.A.’s most valuable franchise for the third straight year, according to Forbes magazine. They were valued at $608 million, up 3 percent from 2006.
